channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024120411
item.description:
Report X-2024120411

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-09T12:25:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-05
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg missing required Hazmat labels and incorrect orientation arrows used. Cap came off 1 x 1 L plastic bottle wetting and contaminating the contents and carton. Bottom 3" of outer carton wet, inner cartons wet as well. Shipper's invoice inside carton states pkg is a "Ltd Qty" but images taken as pkg was scanned at origin do not show damage or markings.
